channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on

item.title: The Exploration-Exploitation Dilemma in RL
item.description: The exploration-exploitation dilemma: do you try new things (might be better) or stick with what works (guaranteed decent)?

item.title: Q-Learning: Mastering Action Values
item.description: Learn the value of actions without knowing environment dynamics. Q-learning: simple, powerful, the foundation of DQN and modern deep RL.

item.title: Reinforcement Learning: Foundations and Key Concepts
item.description: Supervised learning needs labeled data. What if there’s no teacher? RL learns from interaction - take actions, observe outcomes, maximize reward.
